headline: Does New AI-Focused Analyst Praise And CAD Win Change The Bull Case For Tyler (TYL)?
summary: Recently, Tyler Technologies and the Midland County Central Dispatch Authority in Michigan completed the rollout of Tyler’s cloud-hosted Enterprise CAD and Mobile solutions to support daily multi-agency public safety operations. At the same time, several research firms initiated or reaffirmed positive coverage on Tyler, highlighting its public-sector SaaS and AI offerings, as well as its recent Edu.Link and CloudGavel acquisitions, as key drivers of its long-term positioning. Now we’ll...
